nodes.text: C-RG9 was a battle droid used by the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War. During the Battle of Ilum in 3640 BBY it was used to guard the war room of Supreme Commander Rans, who planned a retaliation strike against Darth Malgus' New Empire.
C-RG9 appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic as an NPC on the planet Ilum, who begins the quest for the "False Emperor" flashpoint.
